channel.title: Frutiger Aero Community Blog
channel.description: The latest news announcements for the Frutiger Aero Community.

item.title: 10k/100k Milestone Event
item.author: contact@frutigeraero.org
item.description: Thank you all for joining our community! In celebration of achieving these massive community membership milestones, we've hosted a dual-platform event with winners from both the subreddit and Discord communities.

item.title: Website Launched!
item.author: contact@frutigeraero.org
item.description: To celebrate our awesome community, we decided to create this website, to host our various community content and news announcements, among other things.
